statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY date DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, weight FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling'
SELECT location, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_weight DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, location, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data ORDER BY disposal_method
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, SUM(weight) as total_weight FROM waste_disposal_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_weight > 500
SELECT id, location, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE disposal_method='Recycling' OR disposal_method='Incineration' ORDER BY weight DESC, date ASC
SELECT id, date, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE location='Warehouse A' AND weight < 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data;
SELECT id, location, quantity FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT date, location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_strategies ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4.5;
SELECT id, location, quantity FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT id, date, location FROM waste_disposal_data WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_data JOIN waste_management_strategies ON waste_disposal_data.quantity >= 200 AND waste_management_strategies.effectiveness_rating <= 3.5;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, city FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT site_name, city, region FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM waste_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Positive';
SELECT collection_date, site_id, amount_collected FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE city='New York';
SELECT site_name, region FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT site_name, city FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE region='West' LIMIT 3;
SELECT site_name, city, amount_collected FROM waste_disposal_sites JOIN waste_collection ON waste_disposal_sites.site_id = waste_collection.site_id WHERE amount_collected > 1000;

SELECT site_name, analysis_result FROM waste_analysis JOIN waste_collection ON waste_analysis.collection_id = waste_collection.collection_id WHERE analysis_result='Approved' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT truck_model, capacity FROM waste_collection_trucks WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_records ORDER BY collection_date ASC, weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM waste_collection_records WHERE weight > 100
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3
SELECT t.truck_model, r.collection_date FROM waste_collection_trucks t JOIN waste_collection_records r ON t.truck_id = r.truck_id
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, site_name, capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous' ORDER BY weight_in_kg ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE responsible_team = 'Environmental Team';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE weight_in_kg BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, collection_date, waste_type, weight_in_kg FROM waste_collection_logs WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY weight_in_kg DESC;

SELECT r.report_date, a.analyst_id, r.findings FROM waste_analysis_reports r JOIN waste_management_strategies s ON r.report_date = s.implementation_date JOIN waste_analysis_reports a ON r.analyst_id = a.analyst_id WHERE s.strategy_name = 'Recycling';
